release.notes: * First alpha release for Horde 4.
* First beta release for Horde 4.
* First release candidate for Horde 4.
* Second release candidate for Horde 4.
* First stable release for Horde 4.
* [gwr] Added test case for log output. * [gwr] Added stub for application testing.
* [jan] Fix Horde_Text_Exception extending the wrong class name.
* [gwr] Improve detection of the lib directory. * [gwr] Extract the setup pieces we do in the AllTests helper and heed the Autoload.php file of a test suite.
* [gwr] Added Horde_Test_Stub_Factory as a simple factory stub. * [gwr] Add Horde_Test_Setup for complex test suite setups.
* [jan] Require PHPUnit 3.5 due to BC breaking changes in 3.6.
* [gwr] Added Alarm, Cache, and Session stub factories * [gwr] Fix autoloading to work with PHPUnit-3.6.
* First alpha release for Horde 5.
* First beta release for Horde 5.
* First stable release for Horde 5.
* [mms] Refactor Horde_Test_AllTests. * [mms] Add Horde_Test_Bootstrap.
* [jan] Add test/ directory to include_path to allow autoloading of test classes.
* [jan] Return to old directory after running all tests.
* [mms] Add test factory for MongoDB.
* [jan] Define missing Horde_Test_Stub_Registry property.
* [mms] Fix autoloading from a PHP-defined namespace.
* [mms] Restore error reporting level after running tests via Horde_Test_AllTests#run().
* [jan] Correctly set up include paths on installed packages.
* [jan] Add stubs for Horde_Registry_Loadconfig and Horde_Registry::loadConfigFile(). * [mms] Add factory for a HashTable instance.
* [mms] Fix loading PHPUnit from PHAR file.
* [jan] Bundle PHPUnit and dependencies.
* [jan] Fix running tests from PEAR-installed version.
* [jan] Update to PHPUnit 4.1.3.
